product_name: Boardworks Jetty Stand Up Paddle Board with Paddle - 11'
long_description: With a complete package that includes a paddle, leash and fin, the Boardworks 11ft. Jetty Stand Up Paddleboard with Paddle gets you out on flatwater and light surf at a great value. Suited to paddlers up to 250 lbs., the 30.5 in. wide Jetty Stand Up Paddleboard offers excellent stability for beginners and a welcoming feel for experienced paddlers. HDPE bottom adds durability, and 3 molded-in stringers increase stiffness. 2 layers of 6 oz. fiberglass offer a firm platform, and soft foam wraps the entire deck for comfort underfoot. Single fin enhances tracking in the water. Included paddle adjusts from 66 - 83 in. to fit multiple paddlers; aluminum shaft and 8.5 in. plastic blade weighs 2 lbs. 5 oz. The Boardworks 11ft. Jetty Stand Up Paddleboard weighs 24 lb. 8 oz. and is easy to carry with the included center handle.
short_description: With a complete package that includes a paddle, leash and fin, the Boardworks 11ft. Jetty Stand Up Paddleboard with Paddle gets you out on flatwater and light surf at a great value.
